Class BasicDatabaseConnectionPool

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.worldwind.database.BasicDatabaseConnectionPool
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatabaseConnectionPool
public class BasicDatabaseConnectionPool
extends Object
implements DatabaseConnectionPool

A class for pre-allocating, recycling, and managing database connections

Constructor Detail

BasicDatabaseConnectionPool

public BasicDatabaseConnectionPool()
This is a default constructor if the connection pool instance was created by instantiating using its class name.

It is required to invoke any of the initialize() methods to actually initialize the connection pool instance.

Minimal expected parameters are: AVKey.DATABASE_DRIVER_CLASS_NAME AVKey.DATABASE_CONNECTION_STRING

BasicDatabaseConnectionPool

public BasicDatabaseConnectionPool(String driverClassName,
                                   String connectionString,
                                   String username,
                                   String password,
                                   int initialConnections,
                                   int maximumConnections,
                                   boolean waitIfBusy)
                            throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                   SQLException
Constructs a ConnectionPool based on the calling arguments

Parameters:
driverClassName - The database driver class name
connectionString - The database connection string or URL
username - The optional username, could be null
password - The optional password, could be null
initialConnections - The minimum number of connections possible
maximumConnections - The maximum number of connections possible
waitIfBusy - Boolean flag that determines whether to wait if there are no more available connections. If set to true, it will wait until a connection becomes available. If set to false, it will throw SQLException when a connection is requested and there are no more available connections.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if any of the calling arguments are illegal
SQLException - if a connection could not be created

grabFirstConnection

initialize

public void initialize(AVList list)
                throws IllegalArgumentException,
                       SQLException
This is an alternative way to initialize a connection pool, if the connection pool instance was created with a default constructor or instantiated using class name.

Minimal expected parameters are: AVKey.DATABASE_DRIVER_CLASS_NAME AVKey.DATABASE_CONNECTION_STRING

Optional parameters are: DATABASE_INITIAL_CONNECTIONS DATABASE_MAXIMUM_CONNECTIONS DATABASE_USERNAME DATABASE_PASSWORD

Specified by:
initialize in interface DatabaseConnectionPool
Parameters:
list - AVList with connection pool parameters
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if any of the required parameter is missing
SQLException - if there is any database connectivity problem
